data.name: After you place an order on our site (lilscare.com), we process it by checking the availability of the products and carefully packing them in a recycled cardboard box and paper filling for sealing
data.value: After you place an order on our site (lilscare.com), we process it by checking the availability of the products and carefully packing them in a recycled cardboard box and paper filling for sealing

data.name: All of our products are non-pharmaceutical and are not intended to treat medical conditions. For a diagnosis and for a medical problem, contact your practitioner or other medical professional.
data.value: All of our products are non-pharmaceutical and are not intended to treat medical conditions. For a diagnosis and for a medical problem, contact your practitioner or other medical professional.

data.name: All opinions have not been evaluated by responsible institutions. The information is not intended to diagnose, offer prevention or treatment of medical conditions. If you have a medical problem, contact your GP, medical professional or dermatologist.
data.value: All opinions have not been evaluated by responsible institutions. The information is not intended to diagnose, offer prevention or treatment of medical conditions. If you have a medical problem, contact your GP, medical professional or dermatologist.

data.name: All our products are for external use only.
data.value: All our products are for external use only.

data.name: CONDITIONS
data.value: CONDITIONS

data.name: Couriers usually do not make deliveries on Sundays and public holidays.
data.value: Couriers usually do not make deliveries on Sundays and public holidays.

data.name: DELIVERY AND RETURNS
data.value: DELIVERY AND RETURNS

data.name: Delivery:
data.value: Delivery:

data.name: Do not use if you are allergic to any of the ingredients.
data.value: Do not use if you are allergic to any of the ingredients.

data.name: For the hygienic comfort of our customers, we send the orders with inspection, without test.
data.value: For the hygienic comfort of our customers, we send the orders with inspection, without test.

data.name: How can I return a purchased product?
data.value: How can I return a purchased product?

data.name: If the customer fails to receive his shipment on time, we are released from the obligation to fulfill the delivery.
data.value: If the customer fails to receive his shipment on time, we are released from the obligation to fulfill the delivery.

data.name: If there is a product that is not available, we contact you to specify how you would like us to proceed: fulfill the order without the unavailable products, replace them with others or cancel the order.
data.value: If there is a product that is not available, we contact you to specify how you would like us to proceed: fulfill the order without the unavailable products, replace them with others or cancel the order.

data.name: If you are not satisfied with your order, during review you can return your product without paying for it (before you have left the courier/courier office) and the shipping costs in both directions are at your expense. Products must be in the same condition in which you received them: unused, unopened (eg serum, lotion, etc.), undamaged, in their original packaging, with tags and without signs of use.
data.value: If you are not satisfied with your order, during review you can return your product without paying for it (before you have left the courier/courier office) and the shipping costs in both directions are at your expense. Products must be in the same condition in which you received them: unused, unopened (eg serum, lotion, etc.), undamaged, in their original packaging, with tags and without signs of use.

data.name: In case products arrived at you damaged or broken during delivery, we will replace them and the second delivery will be a gift from us.
data.value: In case products arrived at you damaged or broken during delivery, we will replace them and the second delivery will be a gift from us.

data.name: In our effort to improve our products and services, we may change them at any time. When we make changes or clarifications, they take effect immediately after they are posted. You can find out about them from this page or from the individual pages of our products. Therefore, we recommend that you review them periodically.
data.value: In our effort to improve our products and services, we may change them at any time. When we make changes or clarifications, they take effect immediately after they are posted. You can find out about them from this page or from the individual pages of our products. Therefore, we recommend that you review them periodically.

data.name: In this statement, we inform you briefly about the basic terms of use of our website (lilscare.com) or product. When you use our website and place an order, you agree to these terms.
data.value: In this statement, we inform you briefly about the basic terms of use of our website (lilscare.com) or product. When you use our website and place an order, you agree to these terms.

data.name: Keep them away from small children.
data.value: Keep them away from small children.

data.name: Once the details are confirmed, we send a shipping and email confirmation with the tracking number.
data.value: Once the details are confirmed, we send a shipping and email confirmation with the tracking number.

data.name: Payment is made upon delivery.

data.name: Store them well closed, away from direct sunlight and under other conditions specified on the packaging or on the website.
data.value: Store them well closed, away from direct sunlight and under other conditions specified on the packaging or on the website.

data.name: The cost of delivery is borne by the user and is calculated on the basis of the price list of the courier company. It depends on the type of delivery, location and order amount.
data.value: The cost of delivery is borne by the user and is calculated on the basis of the price list of the courier company. It depends on the type of delivery, location and order amount.

data.name: The information on our website is for educational purposes only.
data.value: The information on our website is for educational purposes only.

data.name: The information on this page and on our website is subject to change.
data.value: The information on this page and on our website is subject to change.

data.name: We may change our products and their composition
data.value: We may change our products and their composition

data.name: We pay special attention to this in addition to the previous paragraph. In our effort to improve our products, we may change their ingredients and recipe. Before purchasing our product, whether you are ordering it for the first time or re-ordering, please review the product information and follow the instructions for use. This is to avoid individual allergic reaction, dissatisfaction and others.
data.value: We pay special attention to this in addition to the previous paragraph. In our effort to improve our products, we may change their ingredients and recipe. Before purchasing our product, whether you are ordering it for the first time or re-ordering, please review the product information and follow the instructions for use. This is to avoid individual allergic reaction, dissatisfaction and others.

data.name: We process your orders within up to 2 working days from the moment of ordering.
data.value: We process your orders within up to 2 working days from the moment of ordering.

data.name: We send with standard delivery on the territory of Bulgaria to the address specified by the user or to the courier office of Econt or Speedy from the address field when ordering.
data.value: We send with standard delivery on the territory of Bulgaria to the address specified by the user or to the courier office of Econt or Speedy from the address field when ordering.

data.name: We usually contact you by phone (if listed) or email to confirm your order and delivery details.
data.value: We usually contact you by phone (if listed) or email to confirm your order and delivery details.
